title: Good as it gets
body: Great headset. The sound is crystal clear and when im on my motorcycle I can answer phone calls and listen to music without any noise from traffic or the road. I would give them 5 stars but i think id have to pay alot more just to get a bit cleaner sound. You cant beat them for the price

title: Doesn't hold a charge well at all.
body:
The sound on these are great! Can't hold a charge at all even when turned off. Had these for a weekend and used the cable they came with to charge as instructed. Used it for a total of 4 hours during that time and had to charge it three times. Would not buy again.

Edit:
The customer service that Treblab provided me with was impeccable. They hand wrote me a letter apologizing for the product and offering a fix. If the fix didn't work, then they were going to replace it free of charge. That blew me away, I absolutely love and appreciate those gestures. The fix didn't work and I received a replacement. Again, the sound on them are fantastic. The waterproofing is fantastic. I ran them dry and charged them for the full two hours 3 times. Each time I used them afterwards the battery was dead within 5-6 hours. These worked better than before but these are still not working as advertised. I want to like them, I really do because their sound is really good, but the batteries don't hold up. I believe this is in-part due to the fact that they do not seem to have an auto-off feature. They stay on. So if you put it down and forget about it, the next time you pick them up they are going to be dead. If there was a sensor that detected that they were put down and auto-shut off, easily would be a 5/5 product and could go up in price another $25 and I would buy them.

They get an extra two stars for customer service. I would still not recommend buying the product.

title: Only pair of headphones to make my ears bleed.
body: It sucks to give such a terrible rating to a pair of headphones that had some care put into the quality of the product. Over the past 5 years of using in-ear headphones extensively, had I come across a pair to physically damage my ears. I don't see many people mentioning pain when writing a review on these, so maybe it's just me. On the other hand, I have used over a dozen pairs of in-ear headphones that I've felt little pain from (if any). It could help to throw in smaller ear tips, but I think it comes from the design of the tip of the plastic of the headphones being ridged (not the rubber ear tip, but what the ear tip goes on). Again, I seem to be one of the very few to have this problem. But from my experience with this product I did not have much use out of it due to the pain it was causing.

title: I was a little leery about great sound coming from small ear buds
body: I gotta admit, I was a little leery about great sound coming from small ear buds.  I'm glad I was wrong.  With a few easy fixes on the equalizer on my phone I got great sound and now use them ALL THE TIME.  Great quality, and like someone else said, you will LOVE the magnetized ear pieces.  Battery length is great, charging time is short, quality is wonderful.  Might just buy another pair for backup.  And can you beat the price?  I don't think so.

title: Great overall!
body: I purchased this earphone for my husband and so far he loves it. Highly recommend this earphone!

title: Just OK
body: Quite disappointing for the bass response.  Otherwise the sound is ok.  I bought these for in the gym but they do not get very loud before distortion.

title: Great connection
body: Effortless and great connection however fall out of my ear.  I don’t usually wear both so the one that isn’t in pulls downward and the other will fall out.  Needs a clip to clip in shirt.

title: serious value, serious sound
body:
I really like these head phones! wonderful bass for an in ear head phone. the highs sing as well. I listen to all types of music and these do a wonderful job.
battery life is good for 3 hours of high volume work out as well.  They stay in my ear no matter how sweaty things get. I've never had to stop in middle of my work out and 're-apply' these phones. I really like that they included lots of different bud sizes. I actually found out that one of my ear holes is larger than the other LOL

title: Five Stars
body: I loved these headphones the sound is awesome and very comfortable a must buy

title: they may be excellent while stationary
body: This will be my third set of Treblab earbuds, and all three pairs have had died on me within two-months of purchase (more or less).  They all follow the same pattern; first they begin disconnecting from blue tooth and then they die and will not recharge.  I followed all the instructions regarding use and battery recharging, but get the same result - dead ear buds.  They advertise as earbuds to be used while working out, but that is an exaggeration, they may be excellent while stationary, but definitely not exercising.

title: Work OK but noise cancellation is dire
body: These earbuds work well, they connect with both my phones and my tablet PC and they are pretty decent for listening to music while you work alone in an office however if you work in a noisy office or if you use them on an airplane like I did recently then their ability to block far less cancel noise is pretty dire. Overall I do think they are not bad value for money as I can't afford $250 Bose over-the-head phones and these are not bad.

title: Waterproof not Water Resistant!
body:
i am extremely happy with the Treblab J1s.  I have Boses and love them - so when I first  got the J1s, I thought they were a bit "flat."  I tweaked the equalizer on Spotify and on my I devices and now the sound is genuinely satisfying.

However, I Want to share a non sound related experience regarding the Treblab J1 earphones.  However, instead of sweat/moisture resistant, they should probably start advertising them as waterproof. I listen to music at night before going to sleep. When ready for sleep, I turn my J1s off and put them on the night stand - I also have a glass of water on the night stand. Last night, I heard our cat poking things on the night stand. He was being really ugly, and it took a while for me to make him be quiet. So, i went back to sleep - when I woke and looked at the glass on the nightstand, there were my J1s - both earpieces - completely submerged in my water glass. The cat had decided they needed a drink, i suppose. Or perhaps he wanted to drown them.  They had been there for a couple of hours.  Needless to say, I figured they were done for, but I pulled them out dried them carefully. Turned them on and they worked like a charm - still are!! So, another kudo to the J1s - they'll stand up to a malicious cat and keep on playing!!

title: good for running
body: good for running

title: it works well
body: it's fine but it could be better you need some improvements

title: Great headphones!
body: I really like these headphones!  I work in an office environment, and love not just the sound quality, but also the noise blocking of the ear pieces.  Great buy!

title: Great Sound For The Price
body: For the price,they cant be beat.

title: Great headphones
body: I hadn't heard of Treblab until I did a lot of searching for reviews on YouTube and I'm glad I kept looking. These earbuds are a great buy. The sound is very clear. What I like is that there is no static or hissing during moments of silence in the music. Very good treble/bass balance. Also I appreciate that the packaging is just the right size, no plastic to cut or unwrap, the cover and box is all paper/cardboard, so it's not bad for the environment.  Great job, Treblab!

title: Horrible connection radius (update)
body:
These wireless earbuds feel very premium and sound great....but if I put my phone in my pocket while listening the audio starts to cut out, same if I put it behind me or on the bed when I walk away for about 10 feet, sadly I might have to return these just because of the connection, might just be defective..

(Update) the seller contacted me immediately and walk me through steps to solve the issue, they perform very well now, upping to a 5 star

title: Cord severed in two areas within 2 months
body:
After 2 months the cord severed in 2 spots leaving me unable to hear from left earbud and unable to fully charge leaving minimal battery life. The return window was a mere 30 days so now I’m stuck with these.

Product update: Dec 30, 2018
Here I sit about to purchase yet another pair of wireless earbuds for $40 here on amazon and I’ve never been contacted about the above complaint. It would be nice to have some feedback from manufacturer of said useless earbuds and know that others don’t experience what I did.

title: Cut your ear canals?
body: These will cut your ears. I had high hopes, but the dents (look closely at the product pictures!) will cut into your ears.  Sent back for refund as they were not usable due to this issue.

title: So close to perfection
body:
I thought these were going to be the ones.  When I opened them I was impressed with the packaging, there's a case for the buds, nice box everything looking clean and professional,  many different types of earbud size and style options are sent in the box,  too many for me to count now.  The sound was fantastic for video, music and phone calls, and the latency, or lag when watching a video where the sound doesn't match up with the video, was very very good.  (I sent back 2 sets of earphones/buds already that were really bad with this, so I am hard to please and these were very good. The 2 sent back were from a different company, not Treblab)
Then all the excitement ended and I knew that I needed to keep looking.  This is the 4th or 5th pair I have tried and sent back after doing a lot of research and confirming they did what I wanted them to do, but each one had something that didn't work.
For these earbuds, the deal breaker was not being able to connect two devices at the same time. These do not.  They say they do if you read through the ad in the description, on the actual ad lower down and it says "Supports Multi-Device Connection".  These do not connect with two devices at the same time.  You can pair two devices with the earbuds, but you can only "connect" with one at a time and use that device.  So phone and laptop paired and I can use the phone, but if I want to listen to something on the laptop, I can't.  I would need to disconnect with the phone and reconnect to the laptop.  Not Multi-Device connection.
These are great, excellent earbuds and if you don't need to connect to two devices at the same time and you want quality made and sound, then these are perfect and the price is amazing.  They just don't work for me.

title: Not a multiple device connection at same time (wrong description)
body: Just bought this product, it says "Yes. These earbuds can be paired using Bluetooth 4.1 to any Bluetooth-enabled device, including TVs iOS and Android devices. They can even be paired with more than one device at a time." but I connect with my phone, but unable to connect with laptop (windows 10). unless I remove (not unpair) from phone then it detects on windows 10. Seems like this product is not multidevice paired with more than one device at a time. That's the only reason I bought this headset...if this not the case, I will return this product and seller needs to change description about multiple device connection...

title: Excellent in EVERY aspect
body: Excellent in EVERY aspect!! Great battery life, tight seal blocking outside noise, perfect fit (the best I've seen after trying several models), lightweight , solid connection and long range, easiness of pairing, and the most remarkable feature of all: extremely rich and crispy sound for an earbud of this size. I'm considering getting another pair for my outdoor activities :)

Great bass and dynamic sound qualities and the extras they give to customize the fit are really nice. If I ever ruin these for some reason I will buy another pair

Customer service reached out to me and replaced the headphones, really happy with the new pair. No audio issues and battery lasts forever.

title: Buy these.
body: I was skeptical of these but was in need of some new headphones and wanted them to be wireless for a change. It was hard deciding against these and the Beats X but these are the better choice. These fit comfortably and has plenty of different sized tips and ear wings. The sounds is wonderful! The bass is great, zero latency, clarity is just as great. But my favorite part is the magnetic ends. No more having to worry about untangling your headphones from a bag. These just fit around your neck.

title: Four Stars

title: Awesome! Awesome
body:
Awesome! Awesome! Awesome! I love these earbuds!!!

These are great for a full day of making calls while working, switching to music at lunch, then going out for a hard & sweaty workout at the gym, without skipping a beat or losing connection, and without having to recharge them too, WOW!

They have a great fit, along with many optional pads & loops included. Sound is great, even while running I can still hear the the deep bass and clear mid-highs on my favorite workout songs!

I charge them once at night and I'm good to go for the next day, no worries!

I use them every day (for about a month now) and THESE are my primary, while my expensive Beats sits at home!

Buy these earbuds, don't waste time spending big money on sub-par sets. I have and all have failed me ($300+). Now I'm a fan of TREBLAB J1's.

Buy Them Now!!!! you can thank me later ;-)

I have purchased also for family members who have been getting maximal enjoyment from them.  Treblab is a delight to communicate with.  They truly believe in and support their product line. title: Updates
body:
April 2, 2019 - product tech replaced the last dead pair quickly.  their customer service is very good.  as mentioned below I really like the sound of these with music while in the gym.  thank you!

March 1. 2019. these are dead again. Don't waste your money.  I take good care of these and the
Right side is now shutting off or cracking when it comes on.  Evidently they are not made to last more than a yr.  So if you want throw aways they have good sound.

2018. Im writing today to update my review of this product.  After my first feedback - the tech support at producttech communicated with me so that I could get a new pair of earbuds.  I simply cut the defective pair, sent them a pic of the cut pair & they reissued a new set.  The replacement were in my hands within a week.

I use these earbugs everyday.  they are around my neck for work all day and 4 days at the gym.
The sound on these are great for music during workouts..  and use with phonecalls while working.
They stay in my ears with no problem during an hour workout..
The memory foam piece will wear out after a while but they supply replacement ear pieces
the magnet feature is nice  and they are not too heavy when they're in my ears
overall a good product for the price.

title: comfortable fit. couldn't ask for more at this price
body: I was looking for something that had strong bass and would last an 8 hr shift at work. These simply fit the bill.Very clear and balanced sound. The bass is NOT lacking.comfortable fit.couldn't ask for more at this price.

title: Only marginally acceptable
body: Easy to pair to iPhone 6. Sound quality is just okay.  Connectivity range from device is as good or better than 10 feet as described.  BUT, when I tried listening to an audible book and using the GPS app (Google) on my phone, the gps instruction only comes through the earbuds sporadically and when it does, the gps and the audible book are mingled making it impossible to understand either. I would expect the gps to pause the book to give direction in ear and it does it this way once in ten. I bought these to listen to music while painting and they are good enough for that - will not use while driving

title: Supurb sound quality
body: I own a lawn care business and use these while mowing. Great sound quality even with commercial mower running. I have never had a problem with sweat affecting the performance even in the peak of summer. Every bit as good as Bose and at a more reasonable cost. You will not be disappointed. This is my second pair as I lost the first one. No hesitation in ordering another pair.

title: Good enough sound for a bluetooth earphone
body: Very well made. Paired quickly and connected instantaneously with a Huawei P20 Pro. Very reliable connection in use. Good enough sound for a bluetooth earphone, decent bass but highs lack air as in any other BT sets. Controls have a positive tactile feedback and are very responsive. I used foam tips which are comfortable and don't require the rubber "wings" to stay put even while doing intervals.

title: Excellent Sound, Excellent Battery Life!
body:
My search is over. I've paid for about six pairs of Bluetooth ear buds in the last 6 weeks and I had been repeatedly disappointed in the battery life - but my search is over! I was leery about the  claims of 9-hour battery life, but I have confirmed they will stay strong for at least four hours!

After trying four previous pairs of ear buds that all ran out of juice at the two hour point, I bought these ear buds along with a  "1Mii B03 Long Range Bluetooth 4.2 Transmitter Receiver" which boasts a 230-foot signal and the pair works well together!  I put the 1 Mii B03 transmitter on my old, 5-tray DVD player and then paired it with these headphones.

The sound was superb out of the box and I didn't need adjust the DVD player sound settings at all. Crisp, clear, and rich in bass right out of the box. The ear buds paired easily with the 1 Mii B03 transmitter on the first try and then it was off to the concert - sort of.

The ads say the ear buds have a 9-hour battery life, so I put three video concerts in the DVD player totaling about 4.5 hours of music and the ear buds out-lasted the music videos!

Previously I had tried three different Bluetooth transmitters which warned to stay within 10 - 20 feet for a good connection. I can't say with any expertise on the question, but it is also possible that the stronger signal from  the 230-foot transmitter allowed the ear buds to work more efficiently at a lower rate of battery use, so it's possible this helped the ear buds go the distance.

All-in-all, a great set of ear buds - sound, easy of use (volume, on/off, charging), ease of pairing, and battery life! I highly recommend!

title: Hubby is sooooo satisfied with this product
body: Hubby is sooooo satisfied with this product!! He says it’s loud and crystal clear!! Loves how it fits in his ears.

title: Worst headphones I’ve ever had

I’d say I want a refund but not for these unless it can be promised that they’ll live for at least a year.

title: Terrible Connectivity to Computer
body: When it works, it works great. However, i have some connectivity issues that pop up frequently. When I listen to spotify or amazon music at work i will frequently get some dead time for about half a second. It would not be a problem if it happened like once an hour, but this seems to happen every 5-10 seconds, making it pretty much impossible to enjoy music. I will most likely have to buy new headphones due to this.

title: Great buy at a great price.
body: They really got it right with these. I have had previous versions of these and they always had some issues I really did not care for. The price is great and the fit is amazing. No slipping out while running or doing yard work. Allows for better noise cancellation. I am a huge fan of Bose, but the extra price is truly not worth the sound difference for me. These sound great. Only issue is the sound does not seem to adjust as high as previous versions.

title: Doesn't work anymore
body: Product completely died on me after 2 months

title: Impressive for price with a balanced sound
body:
I just received the Trelab J1 bluetooth earbuds in the mail. Upon opening the box, the earbuds come with a variety of sizes, a carrying case, charging cord, instructions, etc. The earbuds are magnetic, which is a nice touch. The cord is thin and has plenty of room. The controls are on the right-hand side and surprisingly do not feel unbalanced. That's impressive.

The earbuds came charged 90%, which I appreciate. Upon turning on, I immediately connected to my iPhone 8. Piece of cake, which I appreciate.

So far, I have listened to a number of alternative bands, rap, hip hop, rock genres. Without hesitation, these are the best purchase for sound and price. I was expecting the sound to be about 50-75% as good as what I am hearing. The sound is balanced with just a little more bass than anticipated. I'm not mad about it. I currently have the rubber earbuds on, which fit nice and snug. These earbuds are exceptionally comfortable so far and with the wing tips, they stay in place well. The sound level also goes up extremely high while the quality does not break. Another impressive quality.

I will update this review in another month and in a year. So far, it seems like these headphones are well built and I'm surprisingly impressed with the build and sound quality.

Thanks for reading.

title: Amazing
body: These TREBLAB J1 are amazing sound quality 👍

title: Awesome headphones
body: These work great. Sound is awesome just if u sweat they will move loose on u. But what the heck ur sweating and after 10hrs of wearing they are going strong. Wish my ear could hold up.

title: Great Customer Service and Earphones!
body: The Sound quality is good but the right speaker stopped working after 4 months but I contacted Treblab regarding the warranty claim and they replaced my earphones completely. Very satisfied as of now.

title: Five Stars
body: So far they're awesome no trouble with them at all! And customer service was great!

title: Amazing bang for your buck
body: I accidentally ran over my first pair, and bought a second pair.  I have loved both! These are superb headphones with awesome battery and quality, and the price cannot be beat.  You definitely get your moneys worth out of these.  I highly recommend.

title: Very good product.
body: These headphones are good for the price. Have a very respectable battery life. I have not been able to pair them with my phone though. They pair with my tablet in my computer but I have not been able to get them to pair with my phone. So maybe my phone's two older it's not compatible with these headphones. They definitely are good quality for the money. I would buy them again.

title: Perfect for working out
body: I have very small ears, so I usually have really bad luck with finding earbuds that fit properly and stay in my ears, especially while working out. These ear buds come with so many different size tips, that it was easy to find one that worked for me. The sound is also very good.

title: Theyre good for the price.
body: They're pretty good for what you pay for, a little awkward since the drivers stick out the ear a bit far but the sound quality and battery life are pretty good and they stayed in for a 5 mile run. So they're aight.

title: Five Stars
body: The best headphones I had in a long time

title: Quality is fantastic. Great sound
body: The earbuds right out of the package feels like a high quality product. They don't cheap out on the earbuds. I enjoy some good bass earbuds and these do just the right job. Also the volume can go really high which is an absolute plus in my books. These are my first set of wireless ear buds and was kind of skeptical on whether to get it. I was worried that I would constantly be interrupted by static and what not but these earbuds performed as well as my wired headphones (around $35) if not a lot better.

title: Great substitute for expensive brands!
body: I am pleasantly surprised by these headphones.  First let me say that I appreciate all the feedback I got about a question I posted about this product. Both previous purchasers and the seller answered it within a few hours of posting my question so that helped push me towards trying them out.  The sound isolation is great!  Once you find the right size and style of ear tips you want to use, outside noise is very minimal.  They stay very secure in your ear and I have yet to have any discomfort wearing them.  The sound quality if very good as well.  While to me, they are not quite as loud as Beats headphones, they are still better than most others and at 1/3 the cost of BeatsX, I can't knock them for that.  With a little tweaking of the equalizer, I was able to get the type of sound I wanted and have enjoyed them.  I would recommend these to anyone that wanted to get quality wireless headphones without paying a premium price.

title: I absolutely loved these headphones
body:
I absolutely loved these headphones.  The actually stay in my ears while running and hold their charge very well.

Amazing customer support as well!

title: Perfect you need these!
body: I have had these for about 3 months now and Oh my goodness I have bought so many of these types and these are the best! The battery last for not only one entire workout think 2~3 hours but without charging at least 2~3 more!!! Sound quality is great too. Ear fit for me I’m tiny I wish they had a little smaller option but they never fall out and are comfortable highly highly recommend !!! I have about 5 other brands and types none of which work at all wish I hadn’t wasted my money and some of those were $50 a pop these are what you want!!!!!

title: Five Stars
body: Love them, they stay in my ears

title: Great little tool for your toolbox
body: Comfortable, connects quickly and has sufficiently long battery life for all my needs.  I love it and highly recommend it!

title: Good luck, you'll need it.
body: *Strongly* suggest saving, and getting a quality set of Bose for a bit more.  First set worked great for 7 months of casual use.  Then right earbud sound went out.  No problem, Treblabs warranty covered and sent a replacement set (and great customer service). Warranty replacement had right earbud sound cutting out straight out of the box.  Still waiting to hear back on what happens when warranty replacement is defective. When it worked, sound was fair for the price.  At this price point, I'm expecting better quality than fifteen dollar Walmart Bluetooth headphones, and it just doesn't seem like that standard is met.  If you're lucky, these might work, then buy a lottery ticket, because you're one lucky son of a gun...

title: 2nd time around, let's see
body:
I bought these 1 year ago and loved them.  I use them a few times per week while exercising and riding my motorcycle.  The sound quality is pretty good given the price.  They are comfortable and mostly stay in place (I tend to go upside down when working out).  I allow the battery to run out from time to time and store them in the case they came with (I take care of my stuff).  About 1 month ago, the sound started cutting out in 1 ear.  I wrote the company and have heard nothing.  I feel like they should last longer given my treatment of them.  $40/yr for earbuds is a bit much.  I hope someone will contact me and make it right as I have purchased from this company in the past with no issues.

UPDATE:  After this review, the company contacted me.  They said they had reached out before, perhaps I missed it since the email came from Yulia.  I did receive a response directing me to severe the wires and send a picture of destroyed product, which I did.  It took more than a week to receive the new pair.  They did finally arrive and work great so far.

title: Decent Headphones for the Price. Mind the BEEP!
body: Pretty decent headphones for the price. Usually have to charge them about every two days while I have it connected to my phone for probably 15 or more hours collectively. One thing though, if you press the volume button, be ready for an ear deafening BEEEEEEPP!!!! BEEEEEEEEEEP! An unnecessarily loud annoyance. So just turn up the volume on your phone. Otherwise, decent headphones for the price.

title: Connect to 2 devices the same time success!
body:
I am able to pair both  S7 and Essential phones to Treblab J1 the same time.  While listen to music from Essential phone on J1 I was able to answer the incoming phone from S7.  Once phone conversation is hang up the music from Essential Phone is continue automatically.  WOW!!!!!!!!! 10 Starts for Treblab J1!

By the way, once can only use one device at a time.

title: Defective at first use - Returned
body: My boyfriend ordered these for me as I have been looking for a new pair of good running wireless earbuds. After charging them I turned them on, and paired with my phone with ease. However sound only played from the left bud. After consulting the user manual I did a factory reset and had music playing in both ears again. The next time I went to use them, I once again could only hear from the left. Additionally, these earbuds would not automatically pair to my phone as was advertised (even with Bluetooth turned on, the earbuds turned on, and the two devices 2 inches from each other). I did another factory restore, and still had no luck with returning sound to the right earbud or auto syncing. Needless to say, these guys are being returned immediately, the search for running earbuds continues, and an unfortunate 1 star review is being left.

title: OK at first - then nothing
body: Product worked fine for 2 days, now it won't turn on.

title: Really nice set of bluetooth earbuds.
body: I really like these headphones. I find the sound quality to be very good. As I read in a review, you should download an equalizer app to adjust the sound to your desired liking. The cord clip is a nice accessory. It comes with a fantastic variety of ear tips, both foam and rubber and a variety of ear fins. They stay in my ears when exercising, which was a problem with other headphones I have owned. I really want to try the X2 version by Treblab, but am very pleased with this product.

title: Sound great, are not that durable, have odd audio glitches with calls
body:
They are great but ripped 5 months into owning them
After contacting customer support they replaced my pair though so I will bump my review up to a 4 for that. Sometimes I get really werid interference noises with calls so I can't give it a 5.

title: Microphone and comfort problems
body:
Was very excited to get these. Avid earbuds and headphones person. Looking for practicality with these. However....

There are these ridges that run just a bit outside the ear piece that are sharp and poke the openning of your ear. If you plan on laying back or even just running they get a bit annoying.

The range on these are great though. Unfortunately after a few days of testing quality the microphone feature started to cut in and out. Sigh...

title: Decent Earbuds, Great customer service.
body:
Right off the bat, left side the earbud isn’t even working. Now I gotta go through all the troubles and fees just to get the less money back.

Edit:
The seller reached me and was very humble about fixing the issues. But the product itself was defective so they were happy to send a replacement. I gotta say the equality itself is quite decent. Perfect high frequency but I feel the bass part is a bit overboard. But I don't mind it that much though because I quite enjoy it. But maybe it's not for everyone. But I would rated 5-stars for the customer service. I would recommend giving the product a chance because you can't go wrong at this price point.

title: This is my first time trying wireless earbuds and it does take some time to adapt (having to turn on and off the buds and bluetooth can be annoying, but expected)
body:
For the price this is a solid alternative. This is my first time trying wireless earbuds and it does take some time to adapt (having to turn on and off the buds and bluetooth  can be annoying, but expected).
I highly appreciate their customer service. I had a small issue with my earbuds, and it was promptly solved by the TREBLAB team.

title: Five Stars
body: Great headphones for the money. They sound great, Bluetooth connects easily and they fit well.

title: Not the best durability, but great sound quality and customer service to handle issues
body: Sound quality was good, and if there are defects to the earphones, customer service will help you until it’s fixed. Durability is not the best but sound quality is great and their service makes it worth the investment.

title: Beware Battery Issue.
body:
1 star,
First I give them a try  after using it for few days it sound  good,so I bought another pair for back-up since the price was great.  I  going to give them  5 stars , and after 1 month the battery starting to fail very badly and unreliable, so I thought may be my 2 pairs is okay but the 2 pairs end up same ISSUE .  The battery is so lousy [ I mostly use this in the gyms.)

title: Sound
body: I’ve had my ear plugs for 2 weeks and they work perfectly. Sounds is good and clear.

title: Good for price, lasted 1.5 years.
body: For the price, these are great. Sound quality is pretty good. Lightweight and comfortable to wear for long periods. Lasted me a year and 6 months before one speaker started crackling and then went out completely. I wish they lasted longer but I might purchase them again.

title: Great ear phones!
body: I love the sound that these little things create.  Also, the magnetic backs are a great feature to ensure you can keep up with them even when you don't have them in your ears.

title: Edited: great customer service!
body:
Update: after initially having trouble with the sound cutting out, I was contacted by customer service and recieved help resetting my headphones.  They are my go to for working out.  I'm very happy I stuck it out and didn't return.

I really wanted to like these headphones. After reading the reviews and carefully making my choice, I was super excited to get them in the mail.

Immediately I noticed they cut out, and the connection proximity doesn't seem to matter. I will likely be returning these.

title: Five Stars
body: Good quality for the price

title: Exactly what I needed!
body: Only used a few times, but it seems to be a nice pair of earphones to listen to some music while work and to make calls when I'm driving or just want to be hands-free.  Shipper was great, product arrived on time or early and was packed well and arrived with no damage.

title: The sound quality is great..
body: The sound quality is great...when they're not falling out of my ears. I've tried a few times and got so frustrated; the moment I start to sweat, they pop right out of my ears, even with the different bud covers on .  I have smaller ears and these are just too big for me.  I am trying another brand Treblab because I do like the sound quality.

title: This is the second pair i have ordered the first ...
body: This is the second pair i have ordered the first one never arrived and only one side works. i tried it on multiple devices and every single one only one ear bud worked.

title: Durable
body: Awesome sound, durable and noise cancelling is superior

title: Great and Indestructible!
body: fit is good, sound also good but sent this product through wash/dryer accidentally and they still work and sound great. A good and indestructible product well worth the $$$.

title: Good deal for wireless headphones
body: Use these  head phones in a factory. Noise cancelling is pretty good. Battery life is as advertised. Decent headphones for the money.

title: None
body: Easy to pair/use, sound so clear/crisp and very comfortable to wear.

title: Nice headphones
body: These are great for the price. Not the best sound, but still produce quality music. Good charge and workmanship.  I have a slight problem with the headphone slipping out (side with the controls) but a simple push of a finger fixes it. Would reccomend.

title: Great product
body: Great sound, great design and all around wonderful product.  These headphones have exceeded my expectations.

title: Great Sound. Short Life. Great Customer Support
body:
I loved these headphones. The sound was great and they didn’t slip while exercising. Like I said, I loved these. For about a month. Then they wouldn’t hold a charge. The same thing happened with another set of Treblabs only not so quickly. Sad to say I’ve moved on to another brand.
Appended July 17:
After posting my review Productech reached out to me. They had me try a few things and when they didn’t work they sent me a new set. So far so good. I really hope this pair will last as I love the sound and fit I get from the J1’s. I really appreciate the customer support.

title: Earbuds Stopped Connecting After a Month
body: The earbuds worked great for about a month, then stopped being able to connect to my phone. I recharged them to make sure it wasn't a low battery issue, but no go. Disappointed.

title: Less than 1 year, left ear bud giving out
body:
it hasn't even been a year yet and the left ear bud is starting to cut out at times.

update: treblab sent me a replacement set, but several weeks into using them, same problem has started to occur, i think i'll switch to a different set.

title: Five Stars
body:
Great quality Bluetooth headphones at a great price point.

Perfect for commuting and working out.

title: Amazing value
body: Look good, lightweight, good battery life, super comfortable, and great sound (for $40). I have had mine around a year without a problem.

title: Five Stars
body: Awesome headphones. I'm using them on Galaxy S8.

title: Great. For the price, they're perfect.
body:
Pros
+ Battery life, I get at least 8 hours
+ Fit. They fit well in my ears.
+ Sound. They sound good. They pair easily.

Cons
- The voice that tells you it's connected and the sound effects that follow, lol. Cheesy.

Still, 5/5, great deal for the price - used on Pixel 2 and they work just fine.

title: Love that these buds stay in my ears!
body: We love these so much that several family members own them. Thank you!

title: The fit is TERRIBLE.
body: I have smaller ears, but not by much. The smallest size of ear tips within the box were terrible, and popped back out, while the larger sizes didn't fit. The earfins are too far out, making it hard to securely ift. I have returned this item. Terrile cord as well, a heap-feeling material  worse then the cables of the Apple earpods.

title: Defective Headphones Replaced
body:
Update:  Trelab clearly cares about customer service.  They replaced my broken earphones.  I’m waiting to see about their longevity before increasing their rating, but I appreciate how they’ve stood behind their products.

I've had these headphones a bit over a month.  The sound, when it worked, was what I expected.  Since the right headphone has now gone dead with no sound coming out, these headphones are now essentially useless.

Trelab contacted me to try to help with a factory reset to see if it would resolve the sound problems.  While I really appreciate their outreach, good customer service matters, the reset didn't help and I still have a pair of dead earphones.

title: OK, but screams in your ear like a banshee when angry
body:
The sound quality on these is not exceptional, but is not terrible either, especially for talking voices.  The batteries go bad pretty quick, their life getting really short after just a few uses.

Any "noise cancellation" comes from the design of some of the included earbuds, which are basically just earplugs you can jam in deep.  So, it's a bit of a misnomer, but at least somewhat effective.

Worst feature is that when the battery is low or you click to pair, it screams the warning messages and beeps in your ear like the crash alarm on an airplane.

At this price point, they really aren't bad, though.  Got to pay more money for better quality.

title: Five Stars
body: They work very well love the convience of no wires.

title: Great dynamic range in volume
body: Many Bluetooth headphones have a minimum volume that's still unnecessarily loud, particularly in the context of noise cancellation. These headphones are wonderful because they provide great sound with a wide dynamic range.

title: Good sound, poor durability
body: Right earbud stopped working after only 2 months. Only got a handful of uses out of them. The sound quality is great, but poor durability from my experience.

title: My review
body: Honestly one of the Best Buy’s ever, sounds great, battery life is awesome and the color is neat

title: Don't buy these.
body: Barely lasted two months with regular use. Battery life isn't great and buds aren't very comfy

title: Used them on a long flight and the noise reduction was much better than I expected
body: Exceeded my expectations. Used them on a long flight and the noise reduction was much better than I expected!

title: Sports/workout use...not!
body: Sound quality is good.  The use of the headphones while running, not so good.  Earbud would fall out of my wife's ear while running constantly.  Despite changing the pads, one or both earbuds would fall out.

title: This earphones was great..lasted me only 3 months...
body: I run with these every morning but after about 3 months the right earphone began to short out it still charges but now I only use one side of it because it is all I have.

title: Great!
body: Great!

title: Three Stars
body: They connect well with my phone but the fidelity could be better. They are usable.

title: Good Bluetooth headphones.
body: I am pleased with the J1. I use them at the gym and they hold up well.. once you have them in your ear they are comfortable but i do not take them off once I start sweating because they will start sliding out my ear .. I listen to house music and it’s decent sound quality it has enough bass and clear sound.. as for noise cancellation it’s ok but you need to have the volume up to cancel out noise.

title: The bad: The audio cues built in sound like they ...
body:
The bad:

The audio cues built in sound like they were compressed 1000x through a jpeg encoder
They included a cord wrangler for the back, which is a nice thought but its poorly implemented
The pieces that are supposed to hold it in your ear don't really do a good job
Audio cuts out periodically if the phone is in my left pocket and control buttons are on the right
The fact that you have to pay attention to when its done charging so it doesn't overheat is dumb

The good:

Decent audio quality
The foam tips block out noise pretty well
They hold in my ears nicely due to the foam tips
Solid battery life

Overall this was a good purchase for $30.  Would recommend at that price.

title: Great buy for earbuds.
body: Can't beat the price / value of these earbuds. They are really a great pair of earbuds. Sounds awesome. Had pairing issues a couple times changing from tablet to smartphone, or vice versa... after changing pairing, it would go 10 seconds and buzz then beep then kick in with good audio then repeated continuous cycle. After a couple weeks, it no longer gives me issues like that.  Only real complaint is magnets in the buds themslf. They are not strong enough to maintain connection around neck... Phaiser magnets much better, but they have more issues with their headsets.

title: Great product and price
body: Bought them for my husband. He absolutely loves them. Great product and price. Shipping is fast. Definitely pleased with whole experience.

title: Love these
body: My husband, LOVES his new headphones. He says battery lasts a long time and they were inexpensive. He uses them every day.

title: headphones does not work while swimming
body: music stop while swimming, returning headphones

title: So far so good!!
body: Have had  the J1 wireless earbuds for about a week. So far I am pleased with the sound after fitting the correct eartips. The magnet on the end of each earbud is a great touch. The volume control and mic are a bit to high in my opinion but not a big issue. The carrying case is very nice to have for storage of the earbuds and charge cord. Well done Treblab!

title: Wireless Earphones
body: Ordered these for my grandson, he says they work great. Good price, fast shipping. Thanks.

title: No longevity
body: Fizzled out after four months. This shouldn’t be a disposable product. Not made to last unfortunately.

title: they're great!
body: They're great! Fit comfortably, maybe stick out a bit, but that's my ears. Sound quality is amazing, well done Treblab!! I'd highly recommend buying these over the high priced name brands.

title: Highly recommended
body: I really like products that do exactly as they promise and these ear buds are excellent:  super easy bluetooth connectivity, good sound, comfortable fit, portable, fair price, responsive support.  I cannot ask more than that.

title: Great workout earbuds
body: Worked great, sounded great and fit great.  Synced up easily to my Samsung phone and no problems with them falling out while on the treadmill.

title: Worth the money
body: Ear buds fits comfortable, and connect to what ever device with no problem. What ever you have it connected to you have to remember to turn off earbuds when not in use. They don't automaticly shut off so battery drains easily.

title: One of a kind headphones
body: These headphones are truly one of a kind not only do the magnetized ear pieces help with packing but they also cancel extra noise around very well

title: Loving the headphones
body: I’ve been using the Trelab J1 Bluetooth headphones for about 1 week and I love them. They come with silicon and foam earbud covers. I’ve used silicon earbud covers for years and loved them but I’ve switched to the foam ones that came with these. The foam is like the foam ear protectors used in concerts, noisy manufacturing or construction.  From the first charge the battery lasted a good 7-8 hours. The controls are easy to use and I look forward to using these earbuds on a daily basis.

title: these aren't any good.
body: Had them for two days and the right earbud stopped working in the middle of a conversation. As far as I can tell, these aren't any good.

title: Wish they were LOUDER 💨
body: What I enjoyed the most on these head phones were the sound..it was very clear👌just wish they were LOUDER but other then this,they are good for the money.

title: Product fell apart after 2.5 months of use.  Would like to get exchanged
body: Not a review of the performance of the product, but the quality.  I've owned these for approximately 2.5 months and today the right earbud completely fell apart.  I'm hoping someone from Productech will see this review and allow me to replace these as the return window has closed

title: Buy these headphones !
body: This is the third pair I’ve bought . Fantastic quality, even better customer service !

title: WORTH THE PRICE...SO FAR
body:
Decent product. Average sound. Comes with multiple ear tips and wings to customize fit. I was never able to find the perfect fit where they stayed completely in my ears but, they were comfortable enough and the wings kept them from falling out. The controls are simple and easy to use. The battery lasts quite a long time....I've gotten 7+ hours of near constant play out of it. call quality is very good for earbuds. No problems on either end of the call. They are sweat proof as advertised. I've used them while working out and have had no issues from them getting wet.

I've got 2 gripes with the product:
1). the neck cord is very short. I don't know if this is standard for this type of device but, it could stand to be a couple inches longer. I have a pretty large neck (20.5") and I'm sure the device isn't made with my size in mind but, it would be nice if one was offered that's longer than standard.
2). in the last week to 10 days, the connection to my smartphone has gotten spotty when i'm outdoors. Until recently, the buds stayed connected perfectly during while walking or working outdoors. Lately, the connect has been going in and out for no reason. If i'd written this review 2 weeks ago, i'd have given the product 4 stars. But, this issue has me wondering if the buds are going to stop working altogether.

Overall, they are worth the money as long as they continue to work. I prefer over the ear headphones to earbuds but, these are more convenient for everyday use in multiple situations.

title: These earbuds hit the mark.
body: Good battery life and sound quality. A little heavier than anticipated, however comfortable

title: fits and sounds great
body: I purchased these earbuds for the GYM , replacing another brand, Trelabs, fits great and the sound quality is great, love the purchase and recommend if your looking for a tight fit choose these earbuds

title: Extremely easy to break
body:
After a week of use, the cord came apart from the control switch. You have to be very careful handling these earbuds, because they are extremely fragile. If you own these J1's, or thinking about purchasing, you would be wise to coat where the cord connects with silicone for reinforcement.
Update: Apparently, my review of these earbuds, was seen by the owner of the company. He sent me a nice letter apologizing for my experience, and offered me a replacement. I may have gotten a defective set, so when they do arrive, I will evaluate them to see if my issue was just an anomaly.
Update: I received the replacement earbuds, and they are great. So far, I haven't had any problems with the replacement earbuds.

title: Great sounding pair of wireless earbuds
body: easy to use, no issues with pairing and sound is awesome! Simple product that does what it claims.

title: Easily the BEST Bluetooth earbuds for Conferencing calling I have ever owned
body: I have been using my new Treblab Bluetooth earbuds for a couple of months now.  So far they are easily the BEST earbuds I have ever owned. I used them mostly for work conference calls.  I keep asking people if they can hear me alright and for the first time in years the answer is consostently 'YES, I hear you just fine.'  I have used Plantronics many years and they are consistently terrible.  I had a pair of Beats which were a step up but did not work consistently.  So as I said so far these are the best I have ever used.  Thank you for making a great product and for being customer focused.

title: The battery on these things are amazing and the range
body: These are great, I can experience noise cancellation, great bass, the Bluetooth range on these are incredible and they last a long time I've only chargered them once and are still fine the only down side was that they fell off every now and then when I did quick movements over great product

title: I found the perfect one for my ears and sound quality and comfort ...
body: Using these for a month already, at the gym and at work as a hand-free headset. They come with few different size buds, I found the perfect one for my ears and sound quality and comfort are at the top. I simply wear them everywhere everyday, battery is good enough for my needs. I am buying 5 more for my family.

title: Waste of money!!!
body: I order this on the 18th of October and got it on the 20th and my ear plugs broke and the the warranty is bs i have emailed over and over again nothing has came back yet. Dont waste ur money or time!!!

title: Do not buy these if you sweat while wearing them ...
body: Do not buy these if you sweat while wearing them. I have gone through 3 pairs in 3 months. Spend some money and get jaybirds

title: Great earbuds for the price!
body:
- Decent sound, surprisingly good on bases for such small size and these can get really LOUD! (which is nice too)
- Bluetooth connects fast, no problems with that so far.
- Ton of extra pieces to fit your ear and two materials for the plugs, try them out to find which ones suit you best.
- Passive noise cancellation (plugs your ear from outside sounds) is OK, you will not hear people talking to you but loud noises will still be heard. Foam plugs have better noise cancellation than the silicone ones, so use the ones you like best.
- Nice case to keep them from damage while in a bag.
- Range is around 10-15 meters (30-50 feet) with clear line of sight before you hear some interference, but is reduce if there is a brick or concrete wall/column which is to be expected and that is good enough for me.
- Battery is great, I can get 8-9 hours out of a single charge. I just use them at the gym so I charge them every 3-4 days.
- Don't use the magnetic backs much, but it is a nice feature to keep them untangled.
- Water resistant, I use the for exercising and there is no problem with sweat so far, but they are not sealed so don't go swimming with them.

Bought them on a lightning deal for $30, definitely 5-star at that price.

title: Amazing for the price
body: Sound good , comfortable , not awkwardly lengthy .

title: Four Stars
body: Good earbuds, just wish the battery life was longer.

title: Great product for the price
body: These feel high quality and sound good for the price.

title: Great sound. Bass is wonderful
body:
Great sound.Bass is wonderful. For me - not easy to the ear (needs time to adapt). The clip cable is a waste of time and there no solution.
Will not but it again. Sorry.

title: Not a good connection
body: I bought this headphones because my son had them and he loves his but I had bad experience with mine.  When I’m  switching from my car Bluetooth to the headphones it disconnects about 5 times back and fire before I can have a normal conversation thru them.  Not what I expected very disappointed

title: These are by far the best bang for the buck
body: I've tried many different models and setups of Bluetooth headsets. These are by far the best bang for the buck. Comfortable to workout in(do not fall out of ears), actually cancel background noise and have excellent "full" sound while listening to music and taking phone calls. My Treblab J1 outperform the expensive BeatsX set all day with more immersive sound quality! I'm going to buy sets for the whole family!

title: Great pair or earphones
body: Great pair of Bluetooth earphones. I’ve owned many earphones and headphones in my life. From high quality (and expensive etymotics) to lower quality mee electronics. For the price, the audio quality is good. They get VERY loud. It’s not worth it to pay over double for a different pair of Bluetooth earphones. Battery life is great as well. Overall, very great pair of earphones that compare to some that are doubled in price. Highly recommended. Can’t get anything better for under 50 bucks

title: Started out great but went dowhill. lasted only 3 months
body: They started out as great headphones but the left bud started going on/off until today i stopped hearing any sound from that side. Very disappointed because I really loved these headphones. Wish i could return them.

title: Great earbuds
body: I am very satisfied with this purchase. The sound is incredibly full with plenty of bass.I highly recommend them.

title: Good customer service, Nice sound
body: Purchased these 7/28/18, so its been a little bit more than 5 months and thểre was an issue with the earbuds and their customer service worked quickly to resolve the issue. I would definitely buy another pair, they are good headphones with nice bass and stays on while running.

title: Amazing sound quality and Bluetooth reception at the price at ...
body: Amazing sound quality and Bluetooth reception at the price at which it is available. For calls, it does not noise cancel completely. But the other party can very clearly hear with less background noise. Will purchase again.

title: great earbuds, full of useful features; good product support
body:
Great earbuds, full of useful features, like waterproofness, mic noise cancellation, multi-point connection, and long battery life.
Mic noise cancellation works well, and I can talk to my friends while on the subway. Every day I use the earbuds at work simultaneously with laptop and cell phone. Several times a week I take them to the gym. I charge them once in 3-4 days.
I bought the first earbuds of this model in January 2018. After four months of daily usage, the right earbud stopped working because of a broken wire connection. Shortly after contact, the producer sent me a replacement without a problem. I use the new earbuds for two months already and hope they will last longer than previous ones.
I wish the earbuds had IPX7 waterproofness rating so that I could use them in a shower, but we are not there yet.

title: Waste of money....
body:
[Updated Oct. 22, 2019]
Ugh! My 3rd pair crapped out on me.  Every pair worked for 4 months then stopped taking a charge...same problem each time.  I'm moving on.

Now my second pair is no longer working.  Still within the year warranty so lets see if they replace them.

UPDATE: The quality of the product and great customer service warrants and upgraded rating.

Well, I like these earbuds but am on my second pair.  The sound quality is great but my first pair only lasted a month before it stopped taking a charge.  Since there's a 1 year warranty, Amazon and the seller were quick to provide a replacement pair.  For now, only providing 2 stars since the quality and durability of the item is still in question.

title: Not long lasting.
body: I brought these earbuds  on August 2018, they worked great until today (2/2019).  They just stop working, didn’t even last a year!  Very disappointed.  I can’t afford buying earbuds that cost over $40 and they don’t last very long.  As soon as I finish this review, I will start looking for a new pair.  Hopefully I will find one that will last longer then this one.

title: Would highly recommend buying these
body: For the price point you can’t beat it! Great sound and lots of ear bud options.

title: Don't use these outside.
body: If you are outside and the wind blows, you get a lot of wind noise coming through the headphones.  If you are only going to use these inside, they are OK. If you are walking from your car to the gym,

title: Hardly last 5 months with normal use.
body: One of the earbuds stopped working. The sound quality is good but the main reason I was willing to pay for these was bc I thought they’d last at least a year+ And I wouldn’t have to waste money replacing them frequently like normal earbuds but they hardly last 5 months with normal use. I’m so disappointed.

title: Damn.. Oh Hell Ya.while riding a custom straight pipe motorcycle at 80mph
body:
Positives - I ride motorcycles and i ride with out a helmet so to find headphones that dont blow out of my ears and sound so amazing that I had to look around a couple of times because I thought there was a car bumping the same song .. If you use the ear plug earbuds that come with you will cancel out all the noise around you and you will be able to really hear all the rich tones of what ever song your playing.

Negatives - After my first use they would not recharge, I have no Idea why this happened but there was no problem nor hassle with returning them and I actually liked them so much for their quality and life of battery that I ordered another pair with the refund.

So over all I would tell you if you have ever experienced crap headphones these are not those .. These are my favorite so far ...

title: Great customer service.
body: Very nice earbuds  and great customer service.

title: Five Stars
body: Very good sound and quality it's look like beast x

title: Been using this product for a couple of months and ...
body: Been using this product for a couple of months and has held up well. Used them while running, watching videos, or listening to music. I had no problems connecting them to either Apple or Android devices. There might be fancier and more expensive products out there, but for the price you can't beat these.

title: Broke and not replaced
body: I loved them while they worked. One side sounded like it had a short in the wire,  a week layer it went completely silent... I tried to email them and ask about sending them back and never responded, so I lost the money.... Thanks amazon...  ugh

title: Broke after only couple months
body: Broke after just a few months. Also, if you want these head phones to connect to more than one device, beware. Only one device is allowed, or else you have to manually connect again.

title: Over heated and right side ear piece burnt out
body: They worked great until the right side felt hot and I noticed a small piece of wire delaying near the control panel. They lasted for 8 and a half months

title: Best earphones I've ever owned wired or wireless.
body: Awesome earphones!  Light, fit well with medium foams, block a lot of external noise while running or on the tractor mowing grass.  Sound quality is excellent good highs, mids and bass is robust/tight without being overpowering.  Magnets hold the earphones together well when not using them so they can't fall off around your neck.  Price was excellent, well worth it.  Not a paid shill, paid full price on Amazon.  Wanted to leave a review because I love these, great sound, stay well connected to my tablet or phone.

title: Good sound
body: The ear buds have a really nice clear and loud sound. My ears get sore if I keep them in for very long so I have to take breaks when using them. They come with various sizes of silicon as well as foam inserts which is nice because on the foam ones work for me with this earbud. They do stick out unusually far for one that is supposed to lock in to your ear, but they are still fairly secure in my ears.

title: Four Stars
body: Very good sound.. Deep bass..

title: Great product, works well
body: Great product , works well , very nice price, got 3 pairs after i wore the first one for 1 month.

title: Okay
body: Fins are kind of hard to get a good fit but overall, a good product

title: Loves them
body: A gift for my adult son....he loves them. He says there are very comfortable and very clear sound for talking or music..

title: A solid Investment
body: Over the years I have bought a lot of earbuds. From several dollars to upwards of a hundred. Changed ear pieces did this and that and was never really happy no matter what I did. Then I bought Treblab. I have been able to keep them in my ears for about 7 hours with no pain or discomfort. I would recommend these if you want a really great pair of buds. I have found that when you listen to music its clear and strong. And when a call comes in it's a little louder so you will have no trouble hearing it. All in all a solid buy.

title: Five Stars

title: Five Stars

body: This earbuds are awesome. Sound is high quality, bass great. Very light barely notice that they are around the neck. The earbuds are very comfortable in ear. I’ve had every type of earphones/earbuds and these are just great.

I can’t hear sound from the right ear and it seems like the left ear is starting to go. Will try a different headset for next purchase

title: Great Buy!!!
body: These earbuds are great. Will be buying more in the future and recommend them to others.

title: Four Stars
body: good sound & easy to connect to device.

title: Great while they lasted.
body: I used these with my computer and they worked great. They've been the best wireless for watching movies and tv shows because they are the closest to matching the mouths of people talking (no delay). They also stayed in my ears, were comfortable, and the battery lasted a long time before having to charge. The reason for the 3-star rating is because I had to have them replaced less than a year of owning them (the company was very good about replacing them). Now, just after the warranty expired (this is only 3 months after the first pair was replaced), one of the ears died. I really like these, but they don't last long enough.

title: Great
body: One of the best set of earbuds for the price I've ever seen! Truly impressed! Received mine today and wow!!

title: Very good for your $
body: Very good fitting no headache after you use

title: Five Stars

body: i bought the product 2 times bcoz of how simple it was to use, first time i thought it was some issue, second time also, it is having the same issue after 5 months, one of the ear piece stops working, not recommending to any one.

title: Won't reccomend
body: These hurt my husband's ear and they sound terrible.

title: Not for people with small ears, even with the smallest size ear tip..
body: When I tend to wear it for long periods of time, my ears become sore and tend to switch to wired earbuds.  With on and off use (not daily driver), earbuds lasted for 1.5 years.  One star off for the ear bud size and another for the charging port because I found it difficult to take off/on the cover efficiently

title: I will be buying Treblab over other Brands
body: Awesome earbuds ~ great sound and bass is beautiful thank you !

title: will happily give these a 5 star review
body: Initially would have given these 5 stars if problems had not started within the last week (I have only used them for about two weeks now). The volume tends to fluctuate, ESPECIALLY when running. Not sure if this is a bluetooth or speaker issue. The left headphone seems to be largely okay, but the right is having serious problems. The right will constantly become significantly quieter than the left, say 70% compared to 100%. This coincides with faint but noticeable clicking/popping noises from the right head phone. Will attempt to contact customer service to see about having a replacement set sent to me. If they do so and the product works as it initially did, will happily give these a 5 star review.

title: so battery life is good, the range is also good
body: The sound quality is on par with my $50 Sony earbuds. I used them my entire 7+ hour shift and they never died on me, so battery life is good, the range is also good, just not through thick steel or brick walls. The only down side is they aren't the most comfortable earbuds. Kind of uncomfortable to wear for long period of time, but nothing too bad. For the money it's a really good product.

title: Failed after a couple of months of use.
body: I really wanted to love these because I love the design and sound quality wasn't too bad. I used these daily for my work but after 6 months my left side earbud just failed on me. It started to go in and out (the sound when I move) and now it just doesn't work. So unfortunately I can not recommend these for more than a couple of months of use. Also really wished they used an usb type-c port because it's 2018 and most of the phones have type-c charger ports but also I don't have to carry an extra wire around just incase.

title: These are great earbuds they sound great and they last way longer ...
body: These are great earbuds they sound great and they last way longer than the 7 hours that they claimed. I also like the nice hard round carrying case they came with.

title: Unrealiable - don't watse your money
body:
UPDATE 8/23/2018:  I declined Treblab's offers and asked them to refund the full amount of the order for the 2 pairs of these I wasted money on.  They did so.
UPDATE 8/17/2018:  The company offered me 2 options:  1) replace one pair and send me a $30 gift card 2) send me a $70 gift card only redeemable at their store.  I begrudgingly accepted option 1 as it seemed to allow me to recover some of my money, but then the support rep informed me the company's "Management Department" decided I get option 2.  So the only option being offered is to buy more of their bad products.  None of this replaces the $80.50 I wasted on this product and this company.  I could keep going in circles, but I have had enough.  Getting more of their products will surely put me right back here.  I don't recommend anyone buy this product.

UPDATE 8/14/2018:  Downvoted to 1 star.  The replacement pair I received back in March of this year is already broken barely 5 months later.  The second pair I purchased on this order is also broken.  That's 3 pairs broken with normal use within 9 months.  I contacted the company to replace them as when I purchased them they had a lifetime warranty - note they only have a 1 year warranty now - expect to use it.  They requested sending a photo of the broken items as they did before.  They said they can only send one replacement but offered to send a gift card for the value and agreed to replace the second pair.  Unfortunately I took separate pictures of each pair.  Treblab customer support responded with a detail they weren't overly clear on before - that I must take a picture with both pairs in one photo.  While I sort of get this as they are the exact same item, but I threw them out since so I can't do that.  Dumb on my part, but I don't appreciate the suggestion i am trying to cheat them.  I have responded in kind to customer support and will update this review with the outcome.  Either way this is what you can expect if you purchase these.

UPDATE 3/31/2018:  Updated to 4 starts. Registered the devices on their site.  Sent message on their support/contact page that one pair was broken.  They sent some "things to try" instructions and after I reported these instructions didn't help fix the issue, the company quickly and easily sent a working replacement.  Very good customer service!

Bought 2 pairs as gifts for my kids.  They use them for running 3 times a week and they seem to like them a lot after finding the right size bud covers and making adjustments.  After 3 months one pair doesn't play sound from both buds any longer.  The other pair is fine so far.  Hopefully the advertised lifetime warranty will make it right as I question the reliability of these given the price.

title: Perfect sound quality
body: Very efficient, easy and nice quality

title: Compatibility
body: The sound quality and bass are really good. great for use while running. The only problem is that they are not compatible with Whatsapp. None of my Whatsapp calls can hear me....

title: Awful! "Background Noise Enhancement Technology."
body:
Treblab says:

> Taking phone calls on the go? The J1’s microphone comes with СvС 6.0 noise cancellation, so you’re heard loud and clear.

That is so untrue! It has what I call BNET, Background Noise Enhancement Technology.

It is an excellent way to cut phone calls short, when people on the other end complain about the noise around me, when in a public place, overpowering my voice. It's going back for a refund.

Pros:

Tangle-resistant noodle style cord.
Decent music play time of 4+ hours.
Pretty good sound listening to music.
Earpiece magnets make wearing the headset like a necklace easy.

Cons:

Horrible background noise in calls.
Ear tips not small comfortable for smaller ear canals.
Rubbery cord grabs onto clothing and skin, tugging on earpieces, making single-ear use particularly impractical.
No local audio passthrough feature (microphone to speaker transmission of people near you) to allow face-to-face conversations without removing the headset.

title: So far my favorite.
body: After trying several Treblab headsets and being less than pleased with their products  I got ahold of their J1 models and so far I like these the best out of the ones I have tried.  Unfortunately, I have lost them.  But they have formed well while I had them.

title: Four Stars
body: Fiment needs a little work but GREAT battery and love how loud they get.

title: Great sound
body: These sound better than my Jaybirds. Let's see how long they last, had my Jaybirds for 13 months before the rubber casing split and wiring shorted out.

title: Damaged
body: Product never worked right upon receipt. Only one ear had sound

title: These are amazing
body:
I have had several different bt headphones and these are the best i’ve had so far. Sound quality is too notch. Deeper bass and much fuller sound than any of the others. Higher volume levels these things crank. They also seem to block oht much more of the out side sounds, you can hear anything else when you have these in:) i like how many extra fitment options come with them. Foam ear pieces or the usual rubber ones. Most only have a couple rubber ones. The foam ones are awesome for me.
Highly recommend. I would buy again

title: Magnetic buds keep them on your neck when not in use.
body: I use these earbuds mostly for working out. I haven't has any issues with them. I do like that they are wired between each ear piece, simply because if one falls out of my ear, the potential of losing it is reduced.

title: I really like these earbuds alot
body:
I really like these earbuds alot. They fit well and have good sound. The are great for phone call. They would be a 5 star but the left earbuds cuts out and I only get sound in the right bud.
Update 3-14-18
The company contacted me and tried to help me fix them when that did not work they sent me a replacement. The new earbuds work great.

title: GREAT gym headphones
body: Sound GREAT! I love how long the battery last and the quality of the headphones is excellent.

title: Confuse
body: After 2 months, the wiring is now exposed. Not sure why the casing is ripping. Also one of the earpieces aren't working anymore.

title: They’re good
body: These are really great earbuds and have the best bass out of any earbuds I’ve bought. Although 2 months of use in the gym one of the earbuds lost connection so only one of them works. It says lifetime warranty and idk where to send my old ones to get them replaced because these are great earbuds.

title: These are every bit as good as the expensive ones
body:
These work well with every device I've tried them on.

They're compact, easy to use, and sound great. Even without active noise reduction, if you use the right size eartips (they give you a bunch!) it shuts out so much sound you don't really need ANR.

Nice, reasonably priced setup.

title: Good for only few months... then fizzle.
body:
Based on usage everyday over 5 months:
Battery life became inconsistent 5-8 hours.  My unit is now unusable.  Audio is now crackling and sound jumps back and forth to right and left earbud.  Very disappointed with the durability of this set.  Time to look for a different set.

title: Best noise canceling pair of earbuds.
body: I loved this product the first few months after the purchase. I use them mainly for working out and they do great as a noise canceller, but just recently the right earbud stopped working so I instantly emailed their support team and within hours I got a response and am getting a new pair very soon.

title: Still the best choice!
body: Love the sound quality, size options, and the best part-how long they play!  Hate the cord and right-sided bobbing while I run.

title: Sound
body: Nice sound

title: Satisfied
body: First bluetooth earbuds I've own. So far am quite please. However, I have small ear canals. Does not fit well in my ear, even with the smallest earbuds. Suggestions anyone? Still a great wireless headphone without paying for premium price.

Con - Doesn't last as long as I would like though

title: Five Stars

title: Perfect for small ears!
body: I love these headphones so much! They are comfortable and offer small ear buds. Battery lasts all day. Stay in the ear when exercising. I probably used them 8+ hours each day.

body: Love not having to fuss with cords. These have magnets which keep them around your neck when you want to take them off temporarily. They are a little heavy on the low end for my taste, but that can be tweaked with eq in your app. They connect straight away and are easy to set up.

body: Absolutely loved these as I finally had a pair of earbuds that fit my tiny ears. However, once the battery drops to 70%, I get the "low battery" warning and not 10 minutes later, they're dead. Don't know if I got a dud or what, but it's really annoying. :/ Returning soon.

title: Five Stars
body: My son loves them....

title: Treblab Earbuds...
body: Great sound and range.

title: Budget buy !
body: For the money, they are good. I have noticed distortion on the low end. Good battery. Light weight. The magnets on the ends keep them together when not in your ear, which is nice.

title: Treblab starts out strong but fails miserably
body: Perform as advertised; thanks for that! Sound is good and battery life measures up. First Order: April 11,2018 => after 4 months unit fails completely fails (refuses charging and no longer Bluetooth connect). Replacement Order: July 11,2018 => less than 3 months unit beginning to exhibit same (impending) failure pattern. Won't be making a third purchase!

title: the sound quality is very good for the price
body: This product is welled made, the sound quality is very good for the price. I would recommend it for people that need Bluetooth ear buds on a budget. Mine was just missing a extra pice to adjust the Length.

title: Great Earphones
body: I walk 3 miles in the mornings by our seawall where the wind blows hard and the water can be loud,  I call it my personal aquarium lol. These wireless earphones are so good that it blocks those noises and the quality of sound from my music is great. I love them and the price is a bonus. Great job in making these Earphones for quality at a great price..

title: Reduces external noise, however slightly large earbuds
body:
I should have know this was poorly made product from the beginning as the case it was in was torn up on the side and the zipper fell off, however I did not listen to my instincts. I set my earbuds in the drawer for a couple of days while I was ill and when I went to retrieve them I pulled the earbuds apart (per normal) only to find the wires fall apart with them! After attempting to contact Inna at customer service, I was informed their lifetime warranty does not cover this and accused me of breaking the product because their "product could never have such a defect". Had I known they were in the business of wrongfully accusing their customers and lying about lifetime warranty I would not have ordered this product for risk of receiving a defective product.

UPDATE:
Since the unfortunate event Kate from Treblab had reached out to me to ensure this is not standard procedure for customer service and had offered a replacement for the product.  For this reason I have updated to two stars and will update once the product has been received and tested.

UPDATE:
I have received the new earbuds, so far so good! The case came whole, and thus far the headphones have stayed in one piece. The nice thing about these headphones is that it does a great job cutting out external noise , the downside is the earbuds are not very comfortable.  I currently use the smallest earbud attachment, however the plastic portion just past this part is a little bigger and slightly too big for my ear to get the full effect. If you are looking for something that will reduce external noise, however, these are an excellent choice.

title: Best bang for your buck
body: These sound great, fit real nice and pretty good quality for the price.

title: GET THESE!!!
body: the trelab j1 bluetooth headphones are truly one of the best buys you can get.  with extra fins for secure fit for sports, free memory soft foams for interchangeable feels.... the list just goes on. the sound on these are what you could get on the top tier earbuds and companies like beats.  definitely get these.:)

title: Five Stars
body: awesome!

title: Clear sounding and easy custom fit
